TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from people who have discovered amazing products with our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has opened my eyes to so many innovative products I never knew existed. It's become my go-to source for finding unique items.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As an early adopter, I love being among the first to try out cutting-edge products. This app makes it easy to stay ahead of the curve.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm looking for the latest gadget or a cool new product for my home, this app never disappoints. The recommendations are always on point.

CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our app that curates the latest and greatest product launches across diverse categories. From innovative gadgets to trendy fashion items, we've got you covered.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Never Miss Out on What's New
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Product Discovery App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the app find new products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms to scour the internet and identify the latest product releases across various categories. We analyze data from e-commerce sites, social media, blogs, and more to bring you the hottest new items.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of products can I find?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app covers a wide range of product categories, including electronics, fashion, home goods, beauty, toys, and more. Whether you're looking for the latest tech gadget or the trendiest clothing item, we've got you covered.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How often is the app updated with new products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Our team works around the clock to ensure that our app is constantly updated with the latest product releases. New items are added to the app multiple times per day, so you'll always have access to the freshest offerings.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I filter or search for specific products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! Our app allows you to filter products by category, price range, brand, and more. You can also use the search function to find specific items you're interested in.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our intuitive product search app.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our product discovery app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app helps you find the latest and greatest products across various categories. Whether you're looking for new tech gadgets, innovative home goods, or unique fashion items, we've got you covered.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the product discovery process work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our algorithm scours the internet and curates a collection of the most interesting and trending products. You can browse through our recommendations, read detailed product descriptions, and find links to purchase.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I filter products by category or price range?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! You can easily filter products based on categories like electronics, home goods, fashion, and more. You can also set a price range to find products that fit your budget.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often is the product catalog updated?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our team is constantly on the lookout for new and exciting products. We update our catalog daily to ensure you have access to the latest and greatest offerings.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I share products I discover with friends?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our app makes it easy to share your favorite product finds with friends and family. Simply tap the share button and choose how you'd like to send the product details.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge platform

FEATURE_4_BODY: Once you've found the perfect product, enjoy a seamless purchasing process with secure payment options and fast shipping.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Navigate our user-friendly platform with ease, allowing you to effortlessly explore, compare, and purchase new products.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Connect with fellow product enthusiasts, share your experiences, and participate in lively discussions about the latest trends and releases.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the latest and greatest products before anyone else!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our app brings you the hottest new products as soon as they hit the market. Be the first to know about innovative gadgets, cutting-edge tech, and must-have items.
